title: Duplex w/ equal bedrooms, pets ok, close to major t stops
posting_body: ['Beacon Hill | Boston | MA', 'Rent: $3600.', 'including Heat and Hot Water', 'Available: August 1, 2022', 'This 2 Bedroom Duplex for rent is located in a traditional Beacon Hill Brownstone on Champney', 'Place.', 'FEATURING:', '*Two Floors of Living', '*First Floor Consists of 2 Equal Sized Bedrooms and the Full Bathroom', '*Garden Floor Consists of Open Concept Living & Kitchen Area', '*Direct Access to Shared Outdoor Patio', '*Dishwasher and Disposal', '*Gas Cooking', '*Decorative Fireplace', '*Exposed Brick', '*Hardwood Floors Throughout', '*A Dog or Cat May Be Allowed, The Landlord Decides on a Case by Case Basis After Review of', 'Application Package', '*Located on Champney Place, a Quaint Private Way in Boston’s Beacon Hill Neighborhood', '*Only Steps from All Major T Lines and Public Transportation', '*Quick Access to All Expressways', '*Walking Distance to MGH, North Station, Wholefoods, Charles River, Charles Street, Financial', 'District, Government Center, et']
